name: King
effect: If this Character would be K.O.'d, you may return 1 DON!! card from your field to your DON!! deck instead. [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] If your Leader has the {Animal Kingdom Pirates} type and you have no other [King] Characters, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active, and add up to 1 additional DON!! card and rest it.
